monster.name: Fume Drake

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the fume drake dies, it explodes in a cloud of noxious fumes. Each creature within 5 feet of the fume drake must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 4 (1d8) poison damage.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The fume drake doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) fire damage.

action.name: Scalding Breath (Recharge 6)
action.text: The fume drake exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 41

monster.name: Kobold Tinkerer

trait.name: Inquiring Mind (1/Day)
trait.text: The kobold can cast detect magic, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Alchemical Flame (Recharge 6)
action.text: The kobold unleashes fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 43

monster.name: Runara
monster.speed: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Runara can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Runara fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Runara can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
action.text: Each creature of Runara's choice that is within 120 feet of Runara and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Runara's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text:
Runara uses one of the following breath weapons.
Lightning Breath: Runara exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Repulsion Breath: Runara exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from Runara.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: Runara magically transforms into a Humanoid or Beast that is Medium or Small, while retaining her game statistics (other than her size). This transformation ends if Runara is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 40

monster.name: Sinensa

trait.name: Distress Spores
trait.text: When Sinensa takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
trait.text: While in sunlight, Sinensa has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. Sinensa dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The myconid makes one Fist attack and uses its Hallucination Spores.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d4) poison damage.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
action.text: Sinensa ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is incapacitated while it hallucinates. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Rapport Spores
action.text: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from Sinensa. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 45

monster.name: Spore Servant Octopus

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 46

monster.name: Violet Fungus

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: If the violet fungus is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the fungus move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the violet fungus isn't ordinary fungus.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

action.name: Rotting Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

monster.description: Source: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle p. 48
